title: Cops and Robbers skins legacy or not?
body: Are the new twitch/eve Trundle/voli skins here to stay or are they getting "caught" and taken out of the store after this whole cops and robbers thing is done?

replies.body:

that's the only if i have, so idk. they might, they might not be.

they're legacy skins.
the robbers ones are, the cops ones are permanent.
Thanks, could you link me to where you found this info? thanks :)
